text_block_list.text:
The sky was blue. And the sun was shining. A place where 
the Uma Musume grew by training together. Summer Training 
Camp had arrived! Or at least, it should have――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Tore-cchi~! Over here, over here♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, when it comes to summer, it's all about vacations~! 
Let's enjoy today to the fullest~♪

Together with Vivlos, I was at a luxury resort. 
And that was because――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Well, you see, Tore-cchi, I want to ask you for a favor♪ 
I'll work really rea~lly hard at summer camp! So♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
On our day off, let's go on a date♡ 
Mama gave me some resort tickets~♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Everyday, we've been working really hard, after all! 
Let's spend today getting refreshed, Tore-cchi♡

In fact, Vivlos had worked incredibly hard during summer camp. 
So she could refresh……today I was accompanying her――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: And with that said……Tore-cchi, what do you want to do!?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Mmmm~♡ This smoothie is delicious! It's got a slightly 
salty and revitalizing taste, doesn't it!? Tore-cchi♡

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah! I'm the type that usually can't decide! 
Hmmmm, so this is the kind of thing Tore-cchi likes.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
And so, what should we do next?? This place is really spacious 
and there are quite a few entertainment facilities~!
choice_data_list: ……is there something you want to do?
……is there something you want to do?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Eh-? If it's something I want to do, I'm already 
doing it though? 『I want to do what Tore-cchi wants 
to do!』 That's what today's all about♡

And so, because 『It's what I want to do』, we were now at 
……a place where we could find the world's fastest animal――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Hoeh~ cheetahs can run at speeds up to 100km/h. 
Even though they've got thighs that are that thin!
choice_data_list: They use their whole body to run!
They use their whole body to run!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa! Tore-cchi, your eyes are sparkling! 
Your brain's filled with racing isn't it~!?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
If we're going to relieve that exhaustion, then how about 
this Hotel Spa!? It's Verxina Onee-chan's favorite place!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: It'll fix that weary body right up like new-♪

I was taken to a dark room with a faint aroma 
……I could feel it relieving the fatigue. I see 
……the healing effects of this place were amazing.

This gave me an idea……for Vivlos'…… 
……Train……-ing…… too………… ………………

――……Tore-cchi…… 
……――……Heeeey……you awake……~?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ah, you're awake! Good morning♡

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about it! If this spa made you feel better, then I'm glad♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Hey, are you hungry? It's right about dinner time, 
do you want to go get something to eat?
choice_data_list: Well, maybe some place near the ocean――

text_block_list.name: Hotel Owner
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Vivlos-kun and……are they your trainer? 
Welcome to our hotel.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ah, Owner-chan!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
――Right! A friend of the family. 
You see, Owner-chan, I came to check out the spa with Tore-cchi~!

text_block_list.name: Hotel Owner
text_block_list.text:
I see. ……have you decided on where to have dinner yet? 
If you haven't, how about joining us?

text_block_list.name: Hotel Owner
text_block_list.text:
Using the latest trend of ingredients, an Italian course. 
And while enjoying the night view……how about telling me 
more about how your competitions are going?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Waah, is it the one that's making a buzz on SNS!? 
Sounds great~~♪ But――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Today we were thinking of finding a place down by the beach! 
Let's talk again next time!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Then, let's get going! Tore-cchi, what do you want to eat-?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! He's not the kind of person to get mad over that! 
Besides……――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
I already told you, didn't I? 
Today, I want to do what Tore-cchi wants to do♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Pheeew~~! I'm stuffed! 
Mmm~……and the sea breeze feels nice……it's the best, isn't it?

We were relaxing and watching the sunset while enjoying 
the cool breeze. It was a pleasant time, with our stomachs 
full and our hearts at ease……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ! ……Really?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Alllllright~~……! That means the 『Take Care of 
Tore-cchi Strategy』 was a huge success~♡♡♡

Vivlos seemed to be having fun. 
It sounds like……her entire goal for today was to prioritize me.

Certainly, because of her 『Taking Care』 of me, I felt relieved. 
……However――
choice_data_list: But it probably wasn't as fun for you……
But it probably wasn't as fun for you……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Hmm~? That's not true though? After all――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
……Hey, do you remember? 
That day we went to the street market together?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Just like how I'm excited with new things, in the time we spend 
together, there are also all kinds of other exciting moments.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Ever since I realized it on that day, 
I've wanted to find more of those moments, no matter what!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Like that old man's bag, and Tore-cchi's bag. 
I was……wondering if I also had those kinds of 
exciting moments that I would want to treasure forever.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: And then, I kept looking and looking……and I found it!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
That strict and serious figure during training. That laid-back 
look while being healed, and that blissful sleeping face.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Trendy items, and even this dinner, can't beat that.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: After all――when it comes to you, I can't help but feel excited!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Ehe. ……without a doubt, this evening will 
definitely become an exciting memory, right?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Why don't we take it easy for just a bit longer?

With a gentle sound, I felt a weight on my shoulder. 
For a short while, I watched the sunset together with Vivlos.
